quote: Mother often said that she could never be bothered to understand why Alice did the things she did, and now, more than ever, Alice thought never being bothered was a very lazy way to love someone.
quote_letters: MOTHER OFTEN SAID THAT SHE COULD NEVER BE BOTHERED TO UNDERSTAND WHY ALICE DID THE THINGS SHE DID AND NOW MORE THAN EVER ALICE THOUGHT NEVER BEING BOTHERED WAS A VERY LAZY WAY TO LOVE SOMEONE
